title: Tim CANCELS Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Tim said screw the Gamescast... it's now a KF Podcast. 

From this episode of KF Podcast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWFSh00fql8&t=385s 

New World Aeternum is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC! Get it here: https://bit.ly/3XROcCT

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
